issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Remove concurrency field from GlobalLimitExec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11669](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11669). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
GlobalLimitExec has an unused concurrency field that can now be removed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11669?focusedCommentId=17286429) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9514
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9514>
